connect20/creativestyle_sare.name: connect20/Creativestyle_Sare

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/creativestyle_sare.description: Easily integrate SARE email marketing software with Magento. Synchronize newsletter subscribers, bought items and sales figures for ultimate control over your email marketing campaigns.
